group_1.narration: And so we decided@to accept the dead girls' vengeance.@Given what we had to protect from now on,@however, we couldn't allow ourselves to die,@even if that would redeem us.
To fulfill these contradicting goals@we needed a situation where they could strike out@with intent to kill, so we staged a battlefield@to let the dead girls lash back.
Meanwhile, we would do everything we@could to resist being killed...@That was our solution.

It was an agonizing decision to repeat@our unforgivable sins, yet no matter how hard@we fought and tried to stir them up,@they never laid a hand on us.@Time ticked by as Juri and I were the@only ones to fight.

group_1.textRight: For fuck's sake, they ain't attackin' us at all!
No matter how much we beat these bitches up,@they don't fight back or get angry!

group_1.textLeft: Not being attacked...is a bit of a strange thing@to complain about...
We don't even know how to get out of here...

group_1.textRight: This is our last chance. We'll put 'em in a@situation where they'll HAVE to fight.

group_1.textLeft: I feel like we're doing enough as it is,@but what was your idea...?

group_1.textRight: A sneak attack.@Don't think I've done that yet.

group_1.textLeft: ...That might actually lead to some@casualties, though.

group_1.textRight: I don't wanna murk anyone;@I just wanna defeat them.
But... Either way, these chicks@are dead 'cause of us,
so the most important thing is lettin' them get@their revenge and sort stuff out...
...Not our guilt, ya know?
For that, I'll let 'em run as wild as they want.@I'll even take the brunt of their attacks.
...Besides, we already made the choice to repeat@the sins of the past.
...We're too far gone at this point.

group_1.textLeft: ......[wait:0.8][chara:102100:cheek_0][chara:102100:lipSynch_1]I understand.

group_1.textRight: Well then, Juri the Great is gonna raid@Torayamachi solo.
If ya host your next meeting outside,@we can settle it there.

group_1.textLeft: ...With that, I'll conclude today's meeting...

group_1.textRight: What happened with Juri after that?

group_1.textLeft: She...

group_1.textCenter: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:1024A04]Alright, ya bastards!@If you don't wanna die, put 'em up!

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashRed2][bgEffect:shakeLarge][surround:1024A05]Kyaaah!

group_1.textRight: Juri...stop it!
[surround:1024A04][chara:835302:effect_7001_attack02]OI! Don't just wait for the right opportunity!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:835302:effect_7003_damage02][surround:1024A05][bgEffect:shakeSmall]Guaah!

group_1.textRight: ...Tsk, it's hard to pull my punches so@I don't kill them...
[surround:1024A04][chara:102100:effect_7001_attack02]...C'mon! You too, Sis!@DO IT!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102100:effect_7003_damage02][surround:1024A05][bgEffect:shakeSmall]Kh...!
Cut it out, both of you...!

group_1.textRight: [surround:1024A04][chara:835400:effect_7001_attack02]Fuck off!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:835400:effect_7003_damage02][surround:1024A05][bgEffect:shakeSmall]Ugh!

group_1.textRight: [surround:1024A06][chara:835400:effect_7000_attack01]You're on your own...ain'tcha!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:835400:effect_7002_damage01][surround:1024A07][bgEffect:shakeSmall]GAAAAH!

group_1.textRight: Ah, shit... Did I...overdo it...?

group_1.textLeft: ...Even so, Torayamachi can use this as an@opportunity to fight back...

group_1.textRight: ...Yeah, I'm braced for that.

group_1.textLeft: How about...maybe...we don't do this anymore?

group_1.textRight: ...Yes. Let us finish this here.

group_1.textLeft: It's not good to fight.

group_1.textRight: Then how 'bout ya stop us?!
If ya take us down, the fighting'll be over!

group_1.textLeft: We don't want to end it that way.

group_1.textRight: Man, somethin's weird here.@I dunno what's goin' on with these guys...

group_1.textLeft: ...Indeed, I am quite disturbed.@I mean...this is...
Wh...what...

group_1.textRight: Wh... I just dusted you... You shoulda been@too badly wounded to move right away, but...

group_1.textLeft: Hey, how about we all savor this good fortune@and live happily ever after?

group_1.textRight: What...the fuck...? This...this ain't normal...

group_1.textLeft: Juri, we need to get out of here...

group_1.textRight: And go where?!

group_1.textLeft: Anywhere that grants us some distance...!

group_1.textRight: ...This train's headed for Kamihama...?

group_1.textLeft: I won't get my hopes up, but there might@be someone...
It's a long ride, so feel free to take a nap.@I've no doubt you're exhausted.

group_1.textRight: ...Yeah, more my mind than my body...
